alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 4:51PM CDT until June 05 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marion County in south central Mississippi... Southwestern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 450 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bunker Hill, or 10 miles south of Prentiss, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bunker Hill around 500 PM CDT. Society Hill around 515 PM CDT. Goss around 520 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
